name: witchr: A Door
description:
Witchr: A Door created by Erik Afable and Evgenia Pavlenko.

This game is currently under development and the full project can be viewed and played online at witchr.github.io.

For PC users, use LMouse to rotate view and click on objects and RMouse to move forward. For mobile users, use 1 finger to rotate view and click on objects and 2 fingers to move forward.

View the game in full screen for best playability.
